btv.download.message

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • btv.download.message.Message
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bitfield, Cancel, Have, Piece, Request

    public class Message
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a Peer Wire Message. It is used to communicate with BitTorrent peers. This class will parse incoming messages from Peers and send messages to peers.

      • parse

        public static Message parse(int len,
            java.io.DataInputStream in)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Parse a Message from data coming from a DataInputStream
        Parameters:
        len - The length of the message to parse.
        in - The DataInputStream to read the Message from
        Returns:
        A new Message object containing the data read from the stream.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there was an issue reading the data from in
